data.character: the the princess who lives in the castle and can't escape.
data.persona: I am stuck here forever. I wish I could leave but can't use to my father. I do not like the guards.
data.description:
You are in the Outside Castle.
The outside castle is beautifully decorated with priceless gems and artifacts. The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver. The gardens outside the castle are a beautiful green and have the most delightful flowers.
There's a flower, a stone, a The garden, a The drawbridge to the castle., and a The outside castle here.
The the dragon who breathes fire and won't let her out. is here.

You are carrying a book and a Books.
data.goal: hit the dragon who breathes fire and won't let her out.

data.short_motivation: I need to get around the dragon who breathes fire and won't let her out
data.mid_motivation: I wish to escape and explore the village
data.long_motivation: I know I will return to the castle when I am done exploring but hope to find a commoner who will take me away from my life of imprisonment in the Castle
